name: oee-data-logger
description: Node.js program to log OEE data to InfluxDB
author: Harshad Joshi
readme:
This is a Node.js program to log OEE data to InfluxDB.

Usage:
1. Clone the repository.
2. Install the dependencies by running npm install.
3. Create a .env file and add the necessary environment variables as described in the config.js file.
4. Run the program using npm start.

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/hj91/oee-data-logger
Email: firewalrus@gmail.com
